category.name: Writing Exercises
category.description: A collection of writing exercises and activities to help aspiring writers hone their skills and get their creative juices flowing.

tasks.name: Freewriting
tasks.desc: Set a timer for 10 minutes and write continuously without stopping or editing your work. This will help to improve your writing fluency and tap into your subconscious thoughts.

tasks.name: Character Development
tasks.desc: Create a detailed character profile, including their name, age, appearance, background, personality traits, and goals. This will help you to develop well-rounded characters for your stories.

tasks.name: Dialogue Practice
tasks.desc: Write a conversation between two characters, focusing on making their dialogue sound natural and distinct. This will help you to improve your dialogue writing skills.

tasks.name: Setting Description
tasks.desc: Choose a location and write a detailed description of it, focusing on using sensory language to bring the setting to life. This will help you to create immersive settings for your stories.

tasks.name: Flash Fiction
tasks.desc: Write a complete story in 500 words or less, focusing on a single idea or moment. This will help you to practice concise storytelling and develop your narrative skills.
